Sun hitting the dune field.
Clouds and fog obscuring Mount Blanca.
Thick fog covers the ground at the base of the foothills.
The Crestones lit up by the sun while snow covered dunes remain in shadow.
Snowy dunes.
The sun trying to peek through the clouds.
Windswept snow and sand.
Climbing a steep dune face.
Alissa walking by some interesting patterns.
The line between sand and snow can be blurry.
A detached sheet of frozen sand slides down the dune face.
Ridgewalk to the top of Star Dune.
Tracks of a small hunter.
Patterns, patterns everywhere!
Alissa at the top of Star Dune.
Alissa looking out over the dunefield.
Moon-over-my-ridgewalk.
Alissa running down the dunes, where there was once a topcoat of snow.
Going down the same face I went up, no more snow!
The remaining snow is blue against the sand, because of gestalt or does it reflect the sky?
